website_summaries.verdict: With a smaller size and long hover period, this tri-blade boomerang is a good choice for teaching kids throwing and catching techniques.
pros: Long helicopter-style hover helps thrower learn to catch
Bendable blades let you adjust for better throws
cons: Edges may be a little sharp, so use caution when throwing, and do not toss it to others

customer_reviews.title: It comes back!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves watching Dude Perfect videos on Youtube, and he showed me one of them using a similar boomerang. I bought this for him and he loves it. We take it to a nearby parking lot (when it's empty) and throw it all around. It's durable, with minor nicks and scratches, but still performs like you would expect. I'm very happy with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Bluegrass Gazer

customer_reviews.title: Average boomerang
customer_reviews.text: Trying to go a long distance and return this is not the boomerang for you. This one will return to you, but if there's any more than a breeze it doesn't like to return directly to you. It also does not go out very far and probably goes out about 75 feet and returns. I think the problem with it is just too light and small. It's probably perfect for kids though but for an adult I think it's too lightweight.
customer_reviews.author: brian

customer_reviews.title: Not a Toy
customer_reviews.text: Maybe you watched the boomerang dude perfect video and were like "hey that seems fun" and then you order this and quickly realize "hey this might kill me". Looks like it would be foam or soft plastic, but it is hard. Works reasonably well for the purpose, but comes screaming back at you, ready to chop your head off.
customer_reviews.author: Brian C.

customer_reviews.title: My son wasn't satisfied.
customer_reviews.text: I got this for my son because his cousin got a boomerang for $5 at a local store and they were all having a blast playing with it. We tried to find another one at that store but they were out, so I ordered this one for $14.99, thinking that it had to be better than the cheap $5 one... I guess I was wrong. My son, who is 11 years old, has a hard time getting this boomerang to come back to him. He didn't have any problem at all with the cheap "classic" style boomerang. I'll probably have to order one of that style now.
customer_reviews.author: Steven Rea

customer_reviews.title: A good first boomerang like object for beginners.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for the first step in letting my grandkids learn how to throw and catch boomerangs. I remember a toy like this when I was a boy that was much better at coming back than this one is. But it is serving its purpose. I think it could use more built in return power for beginners.
customer_reviews.author: Craig Matteson

customer_reviews.title: this however was great. Bend the blades every time and again and ...
customer_reviews.text: Ok when I bought this I knew nothing about boomerangs so I bought several for my son and I to utilize. A real boomerang we quickly learned could not be done on our property as they need quite the space, this however was great. Bend the blades every time and again and work on how it best throws. My son was a little frustrated at first but then I came home and he quickly had a good time and I showed him exactly how to throw it. The turning radius is tight which is good to start and for yards. Buy with confidence.
customer_reviews.author: BrokeJo

customer_reviews.title: Good Looking Boomerang But Doesn't Return
customer_reviews.text: We have tried several boomerangs. Clearly some are better than others... This is a great looking boomerang. My son was super excited. We spent hours playing with it in the yard and a field, but we could not get it to return. We have had success with other boomerangs, but not this one. I would have loved to have given it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Winnie2020

customer_reviews.title: Many better options
customer_reviews.text: The boomerang is rather flimsy and too light compared to other boomerangs of a similar price. I got this boomerang after losing the Polypropylene Pro Sports Boomerang. I thought the three pronged boomerang would be more accurate, but it doesn't even fly far. It loses momentum at the end of its flight. Thus, DO NOT BUY if you actually want a sturdy boomerang. I would recommend the Polypropylene Pro Sports Boomerang, which is the same price, flies much farther, faster, and is easier to control.
customer_reviews.author: Hong Cheng

customer_reviews.title: My son really likes it
customer_reviews.text: My son loves going to the park and throwing his boomerang and running after it. When he throws it though it doesn’t come back the way boomerang should. We’ve watched YouTube videos and tried different ways of throwing it. But overall it’s still a great product. He’s only six. He loves just throwing out and chasing after it.
customer_reviews.author: Strongmommy76

customer_reviews.title: Easy for young kids
customer_reviews.text: My boys (ages 4, 6, 7) have been having hours of fun throwing these around the backyard. We had traditional wooden ones and they didn't really ever turn or come back when thrown. These do all sorts of cool things even though the kids are super inexperienced throwing boomerangs. Mom won big with these ☺.
customer_reviews.author: Momma2Four

customer_reviews.title: Mine came bent/broken
customer_reviews.text: When I opened my package, super excited to throw my new boomerang, i discovered that two of the threee spokes on it were bent, making it completely useless.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Weiksnar

customer_reviews.title: Great boomerang
customer_reviews.text: This is a great boomerang. We bought it for my 7 year old and it works great. Both he and his twin sister have thrown it so well that it came back and hit them. If you learn the wind, how hard to throw, the angle and so forth it will return really well. I've been able to catch it 5 or 6 times in a row which isn't common with a boomerang at this price.
customer_reviews.author: T. Patten

customer_reviews.title: Not for kids
customer_reviews.text: After spending about an hour with this, we gave up. We never were able to get it to come back closer than 25 feet away. I read other reviews that said it was great for kids, but it definetly is not. It needs to be thrown very hard to get it even remotely close to returning. I would move on from this boomerang, or any from this company. If you do buy one, you will be disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Steve M.

customer_reviews.title: Takes some work to learn
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loved it, took some time for him to get the hang of it but he finally did, would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Sherri Dike

customer_reviews.title: Fun to throw in air!
customer_reviews.text: Comes back to you! Have not caught it yet but almost! Fun!
customer_reviews.author: Reagan B Williams

customer_reviews.title: Read the directions!
customer_reviews.text: I love this thing and it works really well. Don’t get discouraged at first it...takes some practice!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great gift for a 10 year old
customer_reviews.text: Works well. Really fun. I have never seen a boomerange that really works before this.
customer_reviews.author: K.W

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for kids
customer_reviews.text: Nephew loved it but there are instructions you have to follow...who knew?! Haha
customer_reviews.author: Judy Blume

customer_reviews.title: This is a great boomerang especially for the price
customer_reviews.text: Wow, so fun! My son and I spent hours throwing this boomerang around and perfecting the skill!
customer_reviews.author: Benny

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This boomerang is just awesome. Takes a bit to get the throw down but once you get it this is a blast to throw. Comes right back to you and even if it doesn't it's not going to break easily. Definitely recommend for someone with a smaller area to throw or who is new to boomerangs!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My 7 yr old grandson loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves this. Watched the video they recommend which shows how to throw a boomerang and he was ready to go. Great exercise and hand eye coordination.
customer_reviews.author: Barbara

customer_reviews.title: Did not work as described
customer_reviews.text: This product is extremely difficult to use. At the park with grandkids and could not get it to fly the way in videos or the directions. Would not recommend this product unless you just want to waste your money.
customer_reviews.author: scott

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't work!
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work even with the instructions followed to the tee per the manual!
customer_reviews.author: Amit Bhutani

customer_reviews.title: Just OK
customer_reviews.text: Flies but doesn't return like a boomerang... be ready to go fetch.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Works excellent! Christmas gift for a couple of teenage boys, had them outside all day! Comes with instructions, be sure to follow how it tells you to throw.
customer_reviews.author: Carrie

customer_reviews.title: First time boomerang users
customer_reviews.text: My son and his friends had a great time with this boomerang. It was the first time using one for all of them.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Sotelo

customer_reviews.title: Cool boomerang!
customer_reviews.text: Smaller than I thought. I'm to blame though. Took this sucker out and it really does work. Just need to get down the technique. Really fun!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Excellent boomerang!
customer_reviews.text: My oldest son just got this in yesterday. We went to a nearby park to try it out and it works so well! He even caught it on two different tries. Both my other boys now want one. Excellent boomerang!
customer_reviews.author: CAmomof3

customer_reviews.title: Fun for my son!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it! Make sure you have a lot of room - think open field versus a backyard - because it sails! Great purchase and quick delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Joe

customer_reviews.title: Awesome boomerang!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is a great boomerang. After about a month of having i can easily get it to come back. Its hit rocks and asphalt quit a few times but still comes back. Overall a great boomerang.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A boomerang that does not come back!
customer_reviews.text: Does not come back anywhere close to us. My son still loves to throw it around.
customer_reviews.author: Addy

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good quality, have had lots of fun with the kids. Shipping seem to take a while.
customer_reviews.author: Timothy W. Pieters

customer_reviews.title: Ordered 5 different ones, only 1 is as advertised — so far.  Have only received 4 at this time.
customer_reviews.text: Not as expected. 24 page book was NOT included. Product seems cheap. I’m afraid my grandkids are going to think these came from the dollar store.
customer_reviews.author: Robert McDaniel

customer_reviews.title: Fun but overpriced.
customer_reviews.text: Fun toy, but way overpriced. Don't recommend paying more than $6 for similar item.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Don’t waste your money.
customer_reviews.text: The instructions it came with were for a two prong boomerang and it broke after hitting the ground a few times. Very unhappy kiddo...
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Ferguson

customer_reviews.title: do not work as advertize
customer_reviews.text: my son have try it a million times and it does not return to him as advertize
customer_reviews.author: Rene H.

customer_reviews.title: Hard for young kids to play with
customer_reviews.text: My 6 year old doesnt play with it much because he cant do it correctly.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: lot of fun!
customer_reviews.text: really good, hoping to finally catch it every time soon, lol. crashes down into concrete but its still working like new, very durable!
customer_reviews.author: Tyler

customer_reviews.title: It’s hard to throw
customer_reviews.text: I’m so very hard to throw and you have to throw it very hard
customer_reviews.author: Brady Jacobs

customer_reviews.title: Super fast shipping
customer_reviews.text: Alot of fun. Times of frustration trying to figure out the technique but pure joy when you do Lol
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It seems to require a lot of bending to get ...
customer_reviews.text: It seems to require a lot of bending to get the advertised effect. You'll notice in the instructions that it explains how the bending can be used to amplify the effect, but I found upon receiving the boomerang that the bending was necessary because it was almost bent in the wrong direction along one of the ends.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew R.

customer_reviews.title: Favorite warm-up boomerang
customer_reviews.text: This is my second one of these. I already had an orange one which I like very much so I got another in a different colour to learn to juggle and double with. The same molded plastic rang is available from a few different vendors, I like the checked pattern on this one. They both perform identically, you can throw them together and they will come back less than twice their diameter apart almost every time unless you tune them differently. Great for fast catch, easy to learn. Now my favorite warm-up boomerang.
customer_reviews.author: Alan Yates

customer_reviews.title: Not a good boomerang
customer_reviews.text: Does not work nearly as well as my old wood boomerang. This one has a poorly designed airfoil. The leading and trailing edges are too blunt for good flight dynamics. Also it's too heavy. I haven't seen a good plastic boomerang.
customer_reviews.author: Bob

customer_reviews.title: Like a solo frisby
customer_reviews.text: I have had a ball with this thing. I thought I would need more room to play with it but it turns out it is perfect for my corner lot yard. I have been having a blast learning to throw this thing.
customer_reviews.author: Mark K. Wood

customer_reviews.title: but my daughter and I have enjoyed playing with it
customer_reviews.text: Took a while to get the hang of it, but my daughter and I have enjoyed playing with it.
customer_reviews.author: Preet Hans

customer_reviews.title: Highly recomend for a fun family activity
customer_reviews.text: Wow, whoever thought throwing a boomerang was so difficult!! My kids and I still have a blast with it! Im sure with a little more practice, we will not have to chase it down! Highly recomend for a fun family activity!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Waste of my money
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't work at all. Waste of my money. I am a frisbee player, so i know how to work this thing, but it flips over even before it could come back
customer_reviews.author: Fuhuj

customer_reviews.title: This has got to be a chinese dealer. I ...
customer_reviews.text: Kids loved it. Seems cheap but they like it so meh.
customer_reviews.author: Wyson store

customer_reviews.title: It's solid and sharp! While I was playing and ...
customer_reviews.text: It's solid and sharp! While I was playing and tried to catch the boomerang it made an injury in my hand, please see the below picture. Saad Saudi Arabia
customer_reviews.author: Saad

customer_reviews.title: 100% yes
customer_reviews.text: For a 25 yard book it can hook a lot but it's easy to figure out how to control that on release. Make sure not to store anything on top of this. It's a finite shape and once it gets bent, it won't fly the same any more.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Fun toy!
customer_reviews.text: This boomerang flies well and comes back once you get the hang of how to throw it. Also, make sure you practice with no or low wind as wind really affects it.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Falk

product_meta.title: Blue Speed Racer Fast Catch Boomerang - Returning Boomerangs for Boomerang Athletes. Beginning Boomerangs for Young Throwers.
product_meta.description: This is an ideal beginner boomerang. Great hover for easy catches. Throw up to 45 degrees off the wind direction with as much spin as possible for best results. These are custom molded boomerangs imported directly from Australia. See the video on this listing and use the Illustrated Instructions which comes with it to learn how to throw boomerangs! Note: THIS BOOMERANG IS RIGHT HANDED ONLY.
feature_bullets: Optimized for Fast Catch, with a nice long helicopter hover!
For ages 10-70 years old, Right Handed Throwers only!
Includes our "How to Throw Boomerangs" instructions for Free!
Access to "How to Throw Boomerangs" videos!
